item.title: 中国寻求通过给予地方官员债券回旋余地来刺激经济增长
item.description: 中国正在允许地方官员利用一种重要的政府债券投资更多领域，同时简化审批程序，以期更好地利用这一重要的公共资金来源推动经济发展。【原文：China is allowing local officials to invest in more areas with a key government bond while also simplifying its approval process in a bid to make better use of an important source of public funding to drive the economy.】

item.title: 诺瓦克称俄罗斯可通过多条路线向欧洲输送天然气
item.description: 俄罗斯副总理亚历山大-诺瓦克（Alexander Novak）说，俄罗斯准备继续通过几条路线向欧洲出口天然气，因为经乌克兰转运燃料的合同预计将于今年结束。【原文：Russia is ready to continue gas exports to Europe through several routes just as a contract to transit the fuel via Ukraine is expected to end this year, Deputy Prime Minister Alexander Novak said.】

item.title: 尼日利亚最大银行通过配售融资 2.28 亿美元
item.description: 尼日利亚资产规模最大的银行 Access Bank Plc 在开始实施扩张计划之际，通过供股募集了 3510 亿奈拉（2.28 亿美元）的资金，使其资本金超过了新的监管门槛。【原文：Access Bank Plc, Nigeria biggest lender by assets, raised 351 billion naira ($228 million) in a rights offer to boost its capital above a new regulatory threshold as it embarks on an expansion plan.】

item.title: 华尔街对土耳其可能数年来首次降息看法不一
item.description: 土耳其央行预计将于本周四进行近两年来的首次降息，各大银行对降息幅度存在分歧。【原文：Turkey’s central bank is expected to deliver its first interest rate cut in nearly two years on Thursday, with major banks divided on the size of the reduction.】

item.title: 前喜剧演员与前高盛分析师联手为日本股票基金提供建议
item.description: 一位前喜剧演员和一位前高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：A former comedian and an ex-Goldman Sachs Group Inc. analyst will offer investment advice for a Japanese equity fund that’s set to launch in January.】

item.title: 欧拉电器在消费者投诉年中开设 3,200 家门店
item.description: 印度最大的电动摩托车制造商 Ola Electric Mobility Ltd. 宣布在一天之内开设 3,200 家新门店，以扩大其在当地的业务范围，并解决客户对服务缺陷的不满。【原文：Ola Electric Mobility Ltd. announced opening of 3,200 new stores in a single day, as India’s biggest e-scooter maker seeks to expand its local footprint and address customer frustration related to shortcomings in service.】

item.title: 埃及与国际货币基金组织就 12 亿美元贷款达成初步协议
item.description: 埃及与国际货币基金组织达成了一项初步协议，该协议可能会进一步释放北非国家的 80 亿美元贷款。【原文：Egypt and the International Monetary Fund reached a preliminary deal that would likely unlock a further tranche of the North African nation’s $8 billion loan.】

item.title: 中新社称台湾阻止优步收购外卖英雄公司旗下业务
item.description: 据官方媒体中央社报道，台湾拒绝了优步科技公司（Uber Technologies Inc.【原文：Taiwan has rejected Uber Technologies Inc.’s plan to acquire Delivery Hero SE’s Foodpanda business in Taiwan for roughly $950 million, the official Central News Agency reported.】

item.title: 贝恩、KKR 出价 76 亿美元收购 Seven & i 资产：路透社
item.description: 路透社周三援引未具名消息人士的话报道称，KKR & Co.和贝恩资本（Bain Capital LP）等私募股权公司已对 Seven & i 控股公司的非核心资产提出收购要约。【原文：KKR & Co. and Bain Capital LP are among private equity firms that have made offers for the non-core assets of Seven & i Holdings Co., Reuters reported Wednesday citing unidentified sources.】

item.title: 日本央行上田避免明确暗示 1 月份加息的可能性
item.description: 日本央行行长上田一夫重申了他的观点，即日本央行需要仔细观察各种风险，但没有表示下月加息的可能性。【原文：Bank of Japan Governor Kazuo Ueda reiterated his view that the bank needs to carefully watch various risks without signaling the likelihood of an interest rate hike next month.】

item.title: 海峡时报》报道：孟加拉国调查新加坡大亨阿拉姆
item.description: 据《海峡时报》周三报道，孟加拉国当局正在调查新加坡亿万富翁赛义夫-阿拉姆-马苏德（Saiful Alam Masud）涉嫌的金融犯罪，包括洗钱。他否认有不法行为。【原文：Bangladesh authorities are investigating Singaporean billionaire Saiful Alam Masud for alleged financial crimes, including money laundering, the Straits Times reported on Wednesday. He denied wrongdoing.】

item.title: 工厂故障加剧需求疲软，丰田销售停滞不前
item.description: 丰田汽车公司的全球销量在 11 月份趋于平稳，原因是需求低迷，两家工厂暂停生产。【原文：Toyota Motor Corp.’s global sales plateaued in November as lackluster demand coalesced with a pause in production at two plants.】

item.title: 中国保持关键利率稳定，交易商预计 2025 年降息
item.description: 中国维持关键利率不变，此举在经济学家的普遍预期之中，因为中国试图在与美国的贸易紧张局势可能升级之前保持火药充足。【原文：China kept a key interest rate unchanged — a move widely expected by economists — as it seeks to keep its powder dry ahead of possible escalation in trade tensions with the US.】

item.title: 日本据称将 25 财年初步偿债率定为 2
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，日本财务省将把用于计算该国利息支出的关键利率定为 2%，比目前的利率有所提高。【原文：Japan’s Finance Ministry will set a key rate used to calculate the country’s interest payments at 2%, an increase from the current rate, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 节假日限制市场活动，日本 Topix 指数下跌
item.description: 日本 Topix 指数下跌，原因是汽车制造商和银行业在假日季节活动有限的情况下拖累了基准指数。【原文：Japan’s Topix falls as automakers and banks weighed on the benchmark amid limited activity due to the holiday season.】

item.title: 穆迪称可能因收购利盟而上调施乐评级
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）周二表示，正在考虑提升施乐公司的信用等级，理由是该公司同意收购利盟国际公司（Lexmark International Inc.【原文：Moody’s Ratings said on Tuesday that it is looking at upgrading Xerox’s credit grades, citing the company’s agreement to buy Lexmark International Inc., a step that will ultimately help improve key measures of the company’s debt load and cash flow.】

item.title: 人工智能开发人员看到了聊天机器人在治疗领域的商机
item.description:
人工智能服务可按需为用户提供情感支持，但也存在一些问题。【原文：

Artificial intelligence services can provide emotional support to users on demand, but there are concerns. 

】

item.title: Louis Bacon 和 PJT Partners 就 Caspersen 欺诈案达成和解
item.description: Moore Capital 创始人路易斯-培根（Louis Bacon）与 PJT Partners 就 PJT 旗下 Park Hill 集团前董事总经理安德鲁-卡斯珀森（Andrew Caspersen）涉嫌盗窃 2500 万美元的诉讼达成和解。【原文：Moore Capital founder Louis Bacon and PJT Partners reached a settlement in a lawsuit over an alleged $25 million theft by Andrew Caspersen, a former managing director at PJT’s Park Hill Group.】

item.title: 以色列政府称，2024 年在以色列的外国投资有所增长
item.description: 2024 年上半年，尽管以色列陷入加沙和黎巴嫩的多线战争，并与伊朗直接交火，但外国在以色列的投资仍有所增长。【原文：Foreign investments in Israel picked up in the first half of 2024, even as the country was engulfed in a multifront war in Gaza and Lebanon and traded direct fire with Iran.】

item.title: 计算技术取得突破后，鲜为人知的量子 ETF 赚得盆满钵满
item.description: 在其六年生命的大部分时间里，Defiance Quantum ETF 的表现与其他高科技多头一样：它的回报率并不出众，投资者对它的兴趣也微乎其微，使它只能徘徊在交易所交易基金的投资 "边缘"。【原文：For most of its six-year life, the Defiance Quantum ETF behaved just like any other high-tech long shot: Unexceptional returns and meager investor interest kept it stuck among the investing also-rans that dot the exchange-traded fund landscape.】

item.title: 土耳其明年将最低工资提高 30
item.description: 土耳其将月最低工资提高了 30%，这让投资者松了一口气，因为他们希望土耳其采取具体措施，减少民粹主义政策，并致力于抑制世界上通货膨胀率最高的国家之一。【原文：Turkey raised the monthly minimum wage by 30%, a relief for investors looking for concrete steps to dial back populist policies and commit to curbing one of the world’s highest inflation rates.】

item.title: 俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司预计今年天然气销售收入将超过计划
item.description: 俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司（Gazprom PJSC）表示，预计 2024 年天然气销售收入将超过公司自己的预测，这将在去年的年度亏损之后为这家俄罗斯能源巨头注入一剂强心针。【原文：Gazprom PJSC said revenue from natural-gas sales is expected to exceed its own forecasts in 2024, providing a boost for the Russian energy giant after last year’s annual loss.】

item.title: 银行集团以压力测试影响资本为由起诉美联储
item.description: 银行业和商业团体就美联储的年度压力测试起诉美联储，称他们正在寻求提高规则采用方式的透明度。【原文：Banking and business groups sued the Federal Reserve over the central bank’s annual stress tests, saying they’re seeking more transparency in how the rules are adopted.】

item.title: 国债下跌，长端利率与短端利率的差距扩大
item.description: 国债在假期缩短的交易时段承压，原因是投资者对将现金存放在十年或更长时间后到期的美国国债上仍持谨慎态度。【原文：Treasuries were under pressure in a holiday-shortened session as investors remain wary to park cash in US government debt that matures in a decade or more.】

item.title: 银行起诉美联储，质疑压力测试的实施方式
item.description: 银行贸易团体在一项诉讼中表示，美联储在设计银行压力测试时不允许公众提出适当的意见，该诉讼旨在迫使央行向公众开放测试设计。【原文：The Federal Reserve doesn’t allow for appropriate public input when designing bank stress tests, bank trade groups said in a lawsuit seeking to force the central bank to open the design of the tests to public comment.】

item.title: 从字面上理解职位空缺
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: MultiPlan 与债权人达成 45 亿美元再融资协议
item.description: 据彭博社浏览的一份声明称，医疗保健分析公司 MultiPlan Corp. 已与大多数债权人达成协议，延长其现有债务的到期日。【原文：Health-care analytics company MultiPlan Corp. has reached an agreement with a majority of its creditors to extend the maturities of its existing debt, according to a statement viewed by Bloomberg.】

item.title: 惊奇对决》登上游戏排行榜，网易和迪士尼大获全胜
item.description: 网易公司和华特迪士尼公司联合推出的新视频游戏《Marvel Rivals》在这个假期攀升至 PC 和游戏机排行榜，使这款免费超级英雄射击游戏成为两家公司的新热门游戏。【原文：Marvel Rivals, a new video game from NetEase Inc. and Walt Disney Co., is climbing PC and console charts this holiday season, making the free-to-play superhero shooter title a fresh hit for the two companies.】

item.title: Salesforce 通过抢夺药品客户挑起与 Veeva 的争斗
item.description: Salesforce 公司称，它正在从前合作伙伴 Veeva Systems 公司手中抢夺多个大客户，双方在向制药行业销售软件的竞争中愈演愈烈。【原文：Salesforce Inc. says it’s taking multiple large customers from former partner Veeva Systems Inc. in a mounting rivalry to sell software to the pharmaceutical industry.】

item.title: 量子计算终于来了。但它是什么？
item.description: 四十年前，物理学家就提出理论，认为可以利用量子物理学中令人匪夷所思的力学原理，制造出一种新型计算机，其功能比传统计算机强大数倍。现在，一系列突破使 "量子实用 "更接近现实。目前，人们正竞相开发精确到足以忠实模拟复杂现实世界现象行为的机器，并在药物开发、金融建模和计算机科学等领域实现飞跃。【原文：Four decades ago, physicists were theorizing that the mind-bending mechanics of quantum physics could be harnessed to make a new kind of computer that’s exponentially more powerful than conventional machines. A series of breakthroughs has now brought “quantum utility” closer to reality. A race is on to develop machines that are accurate enough to faithfully model the behavior of complex real-world phenomena and deliver a leap forward in fields as varied as drug development, financial modeling an】
